mapper.select: SELECT T_OBTQ.WhsCode, /*仓库代码*/ T_OBTQ.Quantity, /*库存数量*/ T_OBTN.U_LockQty, /*锁货数量*/ (T_OBTQ.Quantity - T_OBTN.U_LockQty) AS 'AvailableQty', /*可用数量*/ T_OBTN.InDate, /*入库时间*/ T_OBTN.ItemName, /*型号*/ T_OBTN.U_Batch, /*批次*/ T_OBTN.U_ECCN, /*ECCN*/ T_OBTN.U_msl, /*U_msl湿度等级*/ T_OBTN.U_BuyerName, /*采购员姓名*/ T_OBTN.U_COO, /*产地*/ T_OBTN.U_Package, /*包装*/ T_OBTN.U_OriginalBid, /*是否原标*/ T_OBTN.U_GrindingCode, /*摩码类型*/ T_OBTN.U_MOQ, /*标准MPQ*/ T_OBTN.U_ThinkPrice, /*建议售价*/ T_OBTN.U_AreaType, /*库存性质*/ T_OBTN.U_Secrecy, /*是否保密*/ DateDiff(dd, T_OBTN.InDate, GETDATE()) AS 'StockDays', /*库存天数*/ IIF(ISNULL(T_OITM.U_QuoBrand,'') = '', T_OITM.U_Brand, T_OITM.U_QuoBrand) AS Brand FROM T_OBTN LEFT JOIN T_OBTQ ON T_OBTQ.MdAbsEntry = T_OBTN.AbsEntry INNER JOIN T_OITM ON T_OBTN.ItemCode = T_OITM.ItemCode WHERE T_OBTQ.Quantity > 0 AND T_OBTN.ItemName IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) )
